reviews.review_content:
Robert Taylor is a faculty member at Teachers College.  He recently addressed the MSTU4000 seminar, which introduces students to TC's illustrious faculty members' work.  
Taylor's rambling talk made no point whatsoever.  
I have not taken an entire semester-long course with him so I speculate that it would be an excruciating three-month-
long narrative about drawings he's made of people around the world, stories about early aviation, and an occasional song sung in a rather pleasant basso voice.
Workload:
n/a
